entry.value: SELECT CONFIG_CNTXT, CONFIG_NAME, CONFIG_VAL FROM SWB_APP_CONFIG WHERE CONFIG_CNTXT = ?
SELECT LO_TEXT, CUST_TEXT FROM SWB_REQ_CLOSING WHERE (RANK = ?) AND (WRK_TYPE = ?)

SELECT SWB_WRK_TYPE_ATTACHMENTS.WRK_TYPE, SWB_WRK_TYPE_ATTACHMENTS.REASON_NAME, SWB_WRK_TYPE_ATTACHMENTS.SOURCE_SYSTEM, SWB_WRK_TYPE_ATTACHMENTS.NO_COPIES, SWB_WRK_TYPE_ATTACHMENTS.RECIPIENT, SWB_WRK_TYPE_ATTACHMENTS.STATE, SWB_LTR_ATTACHMENTS.FORM_NAME, SWB_LTR_ATTACHMENTS.FORM_DESCRIPTION, SWB_WRK_TYPE_ATTACHMENTS.FORM_ID FROM SWB_WRK_TYPE_ATTACHMENTS, SWB_LTR_ATTACHMENTS WHERE SWB_WRK_TYPE_ATTACHMENTS.FORM_ID = SWB_LTR_ATTACHMENTS.FORM_ID AND (SWB_WRK_TYPE_ATTACHMENTS.WRK_TYPE = ?) AND (SWB_LTR_ATTACHMENTS.FORM_ENABLED = 'Y')

SELECT CORR_TYPE.CORR_TYPE_ID, CORR_TYPE.CORR_DESC, CORR_TYPE.DFS_INTG_IND, PRT_OPT.PRT_OPT_ID, PRT_OPT.PRT_OPT_DESC, CORR_PRT_OPT_ALLW.VCSR_PRT_OPT_IND, CORR_PRT_OPT_ALLW.CHG_ALLW_IND, CORR_PRT_OPT_ALLW.DFLT_PRT_OPT_IND, PRT_METH.PRT_METH_ID, PRT_METH.PRT_METH_DESC, CORR_PRT_METH_ALLW.VCSR_PRT_METH_IND, CORR_PRT_METH_ALLW.DFLT_PRT_METH_IND FROM CORR_PRT_METH_ALLW, PRT_METH, CORR_PRT_OPT_ALLW, PRT_OPT, CORR_TYPE WHERE CORR_PRT_METH_ALLW.PRT_METH_ID = PRT_METH.PRT_METH_ID AND CORR_PRT_METH_ALLW.PRT_OPT_ID = CORR_PRT_OPT_ALLW.PRT_OPT_ID AND CORR_PRT_METH_ALLW.CORR_TYPE_ID = CORR_PRT_OPT_ALLW.CORR_TYPE_ID AND CORR_PRT_OPT_ALLW.PRT_OPT_ID = PRT_OPT.PRT_OPT_ID AND CORR_PRT_OPT_ALLW.CORR_TYPE_ID = CORR_TYPE.CORR_TYPE_ID AND (CORR_TYPE.WRK_TYPE = ?) AND (CORR_TYPE.DOCM_TYPE_ID = ?)

SELECT CORR_TYPE.CORR_DESC, CORR_TYPE.DFS_INTG_IND, PRT_OPT.PRT_OPT_ID, PRT_OPT.PRT_OPT_DESC, CORR_PRT_OPT_ALLW.VCSR_PRT_OPT_IND, CORR_PRT_OPT_ALLW.CHG_ALLW_IND, CORR_PRT_OPT_ALLW.DFLT_PRT_OPT_IND, PRT_METH.PRT_METH_ID, PRT_METH.PRT_METH_DESC, CORR_PRT_METH_ALLW.VCSR_PRT_METH_IND, CORR_PRT_METH_ALLW.DFLT_PRT_METH_IND, CORR_TYPE.WRK_TYPE, CORR_TYPE.DOCM_TYPE_ID FROM CORR_PRT_METH_ALLW, PRT_METH, PRT_OPT, CORR_PRT_OPT_ALLW, CORR_TYPE WHERE CORR_PRT_METH_ALLW.PRT_METH_ID = PRT_METH.PRT_METH_ID AND CORR_PRT_METH_ALLW.PRT_OPT_ID = CORR_PRT_OPT_ALLW.PRT_OPT_ID AND CORR_PRT_METH_ALLW.CORR_TYPE_ID = CORR_PRT_OPT_ALLW.CORR_TYPE_ID AND PRT_OPT.PRT_OPT_ID = CORR_PRT_OPT_ALLW.PRT_OPT_ID AND CORR_PRT_OPT_ALLW.CORR_TYPE_ID = CORR_TYPE.CORR_TYPE_ID AND (CORR_TYPE.CORR_TYPE_ID = ?)

SELECT CORR_TYPE.WRK_TYPE, CORR_TYPE.DOCM_TYPE_ID, CORR_TYPE.CORR_DESC, CORR_TYPE.DFS_INTG_IND, CORR_PRT_METH_ALLW.VCSR_PRT_METH_IND, CORR_PRT_METH_ALLW.DFLT_PRT_METH_IND, PRT_METH.PRT_METH_ID, PRT_METH.PRT_METH_DESC FROM CORR_TYPE, CORR_PRT_OPT_ALLW, CORR_PRT_METH_ALLW, PRT_METH WHERE CORR_TYPE.CORR_TYPE_ID = CORR_PRT_OPT_ALLW.CORR_TYPE_ID AND CORR_PRT_OPT_ALLW.CORR_TYPE_ID = CORR_PRT_METH_ALLW.CORR_TYPE_ID AND CORR_PRT_OPT_ALLW.PRT_OPT_ID = CORR_PRT_METH_ALLW.PRT_OPT_ID AND CORR_PRT_METH_ALLW.PRT_METH_ID = PRT_METH.PRT_METH_ID AND (CORR_TYPE.CORR_TYPE_ID = ?) AND (CORR_PRT_OPT_ALLW.PRT_OPT_ID = ?)
SELECT WRK_TYPE, WRK_TYPE_DESC FROM AWD_WRK_TYPE
SELECT DOCM_TYPE_ID, DOCM_TYPE_DESC FROM DOCM_TYPE
SELECT ExceptionText from aspft004_Exception where EntrCd = @EntrCd and Id = @Id and System = 'CB'
SELECT ExceptionText from SWB_Exceptions where apid = @apId and WorkType=@Worktype
SELECT ExceptionText from aspft004_Exception where EntrCd = @EntrCd and Id = @Id and System = 'CB'
SELECT ExceptionText from aspft004_Exception where EntrCd = @EntrCd and Id = @Id and System = 'SN'
select EntrCd, Id, TransServer, TransShare, TransPath, TransFile from aspft001_trans where CoCd = @CoCode and PolNum = @PolNo and System = 'CB' ORDER BY PrintDt DESC
select TransServer, TransShare, TransPath, TransFile from aspft001_trans where EntrCd = @EntrCd and Id = @Id and System = @SysId ORDER BY PrintDt DESC

SELECT C.COMPANY_NAME, C.CONTRACT_NUMBER, B.FIRST_NAME, B.MIDDLE_NAME, B.SURNAME, B.SUFFIX, CS.NATIONAL_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER, AD.ADDRESS_LINE_1, AD.ADDRESS_LINE_2, AD.ADDRESS_LINE_3, AD.ADDRESS_LINE_4, AD.ADDRESS_LINE_5, AD.POST_CODE, C.Z_CP_COMPONENTID FROM CONT_PARTPNT A, CLIENT_STUB CS, CLIENT_PERSONAL B, CLIENT_PRODUCT C, ADDRESS AD WHERE C.CONTRACT_NUMBER = ? AND C.COMPANY_NAME = ? AND A.CLIENT_ID = B.CLIENT_ID AND A.CLIENT_PR_ID = C.CLIENT_PR_ID AND A.CLIENT_ID = CS.CLIENT_ID AND A.CLIENT_ID = AD.CLIENT_ID

SELECT cmp.source, cp.company_name, cp.contract_number, ps.name, cp.z_cp_state FROM client_product cp, component cmp, policy_status ps where cp.z_cp_componentid = cmp.componentid (+) AND cp.policy_status = ps.reference_id (+) AND cp.client_pr_id = ?

SELECT Distinct cc.Contact_Date , cp.first_name, cp.surname, cp.suffix, zcc.z_name, cc.userid, cc.contact_comments, cc.contact_id From Client_Contact cc, Client_personal cp, z_caller_classification_type zcc, Req_Service rs Where rs.client_pr_id = ? AND rs.contact_id = cc.contact_id AND cc.client_id = cp.client_id AND zcc.z_reference_id (+) = cc.z_caller_classification_id Order by cc.contact_date desc

SELECT cc.contact_id,st.name, rs.comments FROM req_service rs, client_contact cc, service_type st Where rs.contact_id = cc.contact_id AND rs.service_type_id = st.reference_id (+) AND cc.contact_id = ?

Select Tp.Reason_For_Termination, Round(Tp.Conversion_Date - Tp.Date_Of_Termination) As Termdays, To_Char(Tp.Date_Of_Termination,'mm/dd/yyyy') As Date_Of_Termination, To_Char(Tp.Date_Of_Birth,'mm/dd/yyyy') As Date_Of_Birth, Tp.LAST_NAME, Tp.First_Name, Tp.Middle_Initial, Tp.SSN, Tp.policy_number From Client3r.Terminated_Policy Tp where tp.company_code = ? and ltrim(trim(policy_number),'0') =?
SELECT req.mode_cd FROM swb_form_req_mode req, swb_wrk_type_impl wti WHERE req.wrk_type_num = wti.wrk_type_num AND req.swb_user = ? AND wti.wrk_type_desc = ?
SELECT wrk_type_desc FROM swb_wrk_type_impl wti WHERE wti.wrk_type_num > 0
SELECT NAME, DESC FROM SWB.AWD_SRCE_TYPE
SELECT FIRST_NAME,LAST_NAME,MIDDLE_NAME,SERVICING_AGENT FROM Sor_Fc_Awd.FC_AWD_SERVICINGAGENTS WHERE (APID = ?) AND (COMPANY_CODE = ?) AND (POLICY_NUMBER = ?)
